key.status.bleed.tooltip.name: Bleed
key.status.bleed.tooltip.description: i dunno i haven't really thought about it
key.status.slow.tooltip.name: Slow
key.status.slow.tooltip.description: Reduces the targets [key.stat.attack.speed] and [key.stat.movement.speed] for the duration.
key.status.necrosis.tooltip.name: Necrosis
key.status.necrosis.tooltip.description:
Each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.necrosis] [key.flavour.negative](increases) the targets [key.stat.health.min] by [key.variable.positive](1).
If the targets [key.stat.health.min] becomes [key.flavour.important](Greater) than the targets [key.stat.health](Current Health), they will [key.mechanic.death](Die) (horribly).
The [key.stat.health.min] increase is reduced by the targets [key.stat.defense.necrotic].
key.status.rime.tooltip.name: Rime
key.status.rime.tooltip.description:
Each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.rime] reduces the targets [key.stat.defense.frost] by [key.variable.positive](1).
If the targets [key.status.rime] [key.mechanic.stacks] reach the targets [key.stat.posture.max] they will become [key.status.frozen].
The effects of [key.status.rime] are reduced by the targets [key.stat.defense.frost].
key.status.frozen.tooltip.name: Frozen
key.status.frozen.tooltip.description:
The target is [key.flavour.frost](encased in ice) and unable to move.
This will [key.mechanic.trigger] [key.trigger.on_stun] effects.
key.status.bane.tooltip.name: Bane
key.status.bane.tooltip.description:
Each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.bane] causes [key.variable.positive](1) point of [key.flag.poison] [key.mechanic.damage] per second.
Nice and simple.
key.status.charge.tooltip.name: Charge
key.status.charge.tooltip.description:
Each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.charge] reduces the targets [key.stat.defense.electric] by [key.variable.positive](0.5).
Each tick there is a chance for the target to reduce its [key.status.charge] [key.mechanic.stacks] by [key.variable.positive](50%).
When this happens, the target will send an [key.flavour.electric](arc of electricity) to another nearby enemy for [key.variable.positive](1) [key.flag.electric] [key.mechanic.damage] per [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) lost.
key.status.entropic.tooltip.name: Entropic
key.status.entropic.tooltip.description:
[key.status.entropic] targets are falling apart at a fundamental level.
For each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.entropic] reduce [key.flavour.important](ALL) of the targets [key.stat.category.defense](Resistances) by [key.variable.positive](1%).
key.status.burn.tooltip.name: Burn
key.status.burn.tooltip.description:
[key.flavour.dramatic](The target is weakened by the immense pain of scalding flesh.)
For each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.burn] you reduce the targets [key.stat.defense.armor] and [key.stat.defense.fire] by [key.variable.positive](1).
Additionally, the target will take [key.variable.positive](0.5) [key.mechanic.posture_damage_enemy] per [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) per second.
The strength of the [key.status.burn] is reduced by the targets [key.stat.defense.fire].
key.status.glimpse.tooltip.name: Glimpse
key.status.glimpse.tooltip.description:
The target has [key.flavour.negative](seen something it shouldn't).
For each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.glimpse] reduce the targets [key.stat.defense.occult] by [key.variable.positive](1).
Additionally, each tick the target has a chance (scaling with [key.status.glimpse] [key.mechanic.stacks] to become inflicted with a random [key.status.madness] effect.
[key.flavour.fluff]Mind and flesh writhe in equal measure in the face of the Abyss.
key.status.radiance.tooltip.name: Radiance
key.status.radiance.tooltip.description:
The target is infused with [key.flag.divine](Divine Energies).
[key.trigger.on_death] the target will explode in a burst of [key.flag.divine](Divine Radiance) dealing [key.variable.positive](1) [key.flag.divine] [key.mechanic.damage] for each [key.mechanic.stacks](Stack) of [key.status.radiance].
Additionally, the explosion applies [key.status.radiance] equal to [key.variable.positive](50%) of the [key.mechanic.damage] dealt.
This explosion will not hit yourself or allies.
